snippet: Field goal attempts have been decisive in several key college games in recent seasons and the national title game on Monday could come down to a fateful, final kick.
abstract: Field goal attempts have been decisive in several key college football games in recent seasons and the national title game between Louisiana State and Alabama could come down to a fateful, final kick; neither team was able to score a touchdown in their previous meeting, which LSU won, 9-6, in overtime on a 25-yard field goal after Alabama missed on four kicking attempts.
lead_paragraph: Field goal attempts have been decisive in several key college games in recent seasons and the national title game on Monday could come down to a fateful, final kick.

headline.seo: L.S.U.-Alabama Outcome Could Again Depend on Kickers
headline.main: The Heartbreak of the Missed Field-Goal Try
headline.print_headline: The Heartbreak of the Missed Field-Goal Try
